1558890.name: WormJuice Skateboarding Olympics
1558890.description:
Ollie straight into a vibrant nes colored world!
Skate and compete in premade Arena tracks, download new ones, or build whatever you like with the provided voxel-styled objects (by poetic voxels).
Ride down the Mega Ski Ramp and jump onto the speedrun track!
Try to get that fastest time or make the speedrun machine generate your favorite new track.

In short
WormJuice Skateboarding Olympics keeps you going for hours, losing track of time with plain old fun.

Features include

Level building: A custom made level editor designed to build great linear skateboarding tracks.
Saving: Store levels on your hard drive.
Uploading & downloading: Your game login connects you with the realtime database allowing you to upload and download any player created level.
Show your appreciation: Comment, like, add and watch playthrough videos per level.

Board control - Its easy
Set and meant as old school arcade gaming, the board control is kept simple. Kickflip, Heelflip, Front shove, Backshove, change stance. Combine these to rotate the board in various ways. Grinding,sliding is based on landing and board rotation.
Slowmotion can be activated after each ollie.

Skateshop - Do it with style
Wormcoin is the currency you get by making combos in the Arena or on the speedrun track.
Spend the wormcoin directly in the skateshop on new decks, characters and even music.

Arena - Build and compete!
Create your own tracks with all the objects provided in the level editor.
Building and competing costs wormcoin so get on your board and skate!
Earn more wormcoin by winning the competition (1 leaderboard per track)

Speedrun - Randomize or be specific
Put in a number, pick a theme & spin it!
Now watch the speedrun machine put all the pieces in place.
Its up to you to reach the other side as fast as posible.
Put your wormcoin in a coinpot, and see if you can double or tripple that amount!

Ready for more - Expect new packs
WormJuice Skateboarding is build with pack support, meaning new packs will be introduced by wormjuice studio in future game updates.
Packs can include:
Arena obstacles, Speedrun themes, Skateshop Items like Decks Skaters & Music

Music - Coming from boomboxes placed in the levels.
Features a built in music player with albums by studio selected artists across multiple genres.
Featuring artists like After Arrival, MC STEF, WormJuiceDev, Along Came The Gold
Get more music from these artists in the skateshop

Important: This game requires a xbox controller to get the best experience skating. There is also keyboard support. The level editor is controlled only by mouse and keyboard. Video tutorials are ingame. Requires a DirectX 11 or above graphics card. Graphics options available ingame.

Become one with the community on discord, twitch and youtube.
1558890.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
